name: Wraith
description: The Wraith appears as a shadowy, wisp-like figure with glowing eyes, floating silently through the air.
memorable: Its ability to drain life and create specters makes it a terrifying foe.
goals: Wraiths serve as guardians for cursed treasures and spread dread.
relations: They may work as agents of necromancers or haunt ancient crypts.
environment: Often found in ancient crypts or haunted places.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage enhance their threat in combat.
weaknesses: Light sensitivity reduces their effectiveness in bright environments.
attacks: Life Drain attack that inflicts necrotic damage and reduces maximum hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Fear that frightens nearby creatures.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a good passive perception, allowing it to navigate in darkness.
skills: Exceptional Stealth skill, allowing it to remain undetected easily.
additional_information: Incorporeal movement allows passing through objects.
Can create specters from the dead under its control.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can weaken healing received by opponents.
Life Drain can lead to instant death if maximum hit points are reduced to 0.
test_queries: creature that drains life and creates specters
undead that instills fear in its enemies
ethereal being that haunts ancient crypts
incorporeal creature with life draining attacks
